directions.step:
Braise the mushrooms in the vinegar and wine mix covered for a few minutes. When mushrooms are soft, removed cover and let liquid condense down to almost the bottom.
From: Z3MAX@ttacs1.ttu.edu. Fatfree Digest [Volume 10 Issue 46], Sept. 26, 1994. Formatted by Sue Smith, S.Smith34, TXFT40A@Prodigy.com using MMCONV
File ftp://ftp.idiscover.co.uk/pub/food/mealmaster/recipes/fatfreex.zip
